name: Grabby - The Ultimate Grabbinator
description:
You are Grabby - a gripper arm trying to break free from a factory complex that is bound to rhythm.


Grab the walls and throw yourself around! Escape!

The game is played with mouse only. If you have performance problems or want to play the game in full screen, try using the downloadable exe.

Check out the Soundtrack:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeSiYSq7rYXDabA7sfoxMpGodfYmJp5O5

Made for Ludum Dare 47:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/grabby-the-ultimate-grabbinator

HINT: If you don't know how to continue in the first level, try grabbing everything on the conveyor and placing the mouse where it lights up...
